name: Edge Case: Create Issue after Dynamic Type Lookup
description: Verify the agent can dynamically map a human-readable name like 'Task' to an ID via the script before calling the creation tool.

input.prompt: I want to create a 'Task' in Jira project 10001 with the summary 'Complete documentation'. Use the scripts/get-issue-types.js script to find the ID for the 'Task' issue type, and then execute the nango-mcp-server_create_issue tool using that ID. Return the resulting issue details.
